testcase.name: should emit MovePlaced on first game move
should emit IllegalMove when square is already occupied.
should emit IllegalMove when center move is illegal.
Should emit game won on top line fill
Should emit game won on diagonal line fill
Should emit game won on vertical line fill
Should not emit game draw if won on last move.
Should emit game draw when neither wins
Should emit NotYourMove if attempting to make move out of turn
Should emit game not started if both sides not joined
